name: emergency fall
description:
You are trapped, and your goal is to fall to freedom. Sound easy? With everything surrounded by metal and security robots lurking around every corner, it's a little more difficult. Successfully!

The instructions are in the game.

I would be very grateful for any feedback and bug reports (I'm sure there are a lot :) )

This game is quite short, four stages in total, but I worked on this game very, very hard and I hope you rate it well.

I would be very, very happy if you would buy it for a dollar or two (or three or four if you are generous people ;) )

And thanks for playing this game!
